content:
Hi, FSH School pointed me towards this channel if I couldn't resolve an error, so here I am..

Following the steps of the SUSHI tutorial I got an error running sushi after step 7. the error message: No element found at path extension[species] for CardRule in FishPatient, skipping rule

this is the content of my fsh file: 

Profile:        FishPatient
Parent:         Patient
Id:             fish-patient
Title:          "Fish Patient"
Description:    "A patient that is a type of fish."
* name              0..1
* maritalStatus     0..0
* communication     0..0
* extension contains FishSpecies named species 0..1

Extension:  FishSpecies
Id: fish-species
Title:  "Fish Species"
Description: "The species name of a piscine (fish) patient."
* value[x] only CodeableConcept

note that if I run sushi in the FishExampleComplete folder, the same error occurs. Help is appreciated!

SUSHI v2.2.1 (implements FHIR Shorthand specification v1.2.0)

I've copied that FSH into an empty FSH project and ran SUSHI 2.2.1 on it. It runs without error for me. I wonder if there is some odd character in your FSH file that is throwing things off? Can you try deleting the contents of the file, then copying your code from above and pasting it into the cleared out file? That should be basically the same as what I just did (and worked for me).
deinstalled and reinstalled the whole lot. did the job! thank you for your help!
Sebastiaan Raap has marked this topic as resolved.
